intro: Psychotria kukenanensis, commonly known as the Kukenan psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically red when mature. This species is often found in the understory of humid tropical forests, where it thrives in shaded, moist conditions.
